statements: SELECT * FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, property_value FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE risk_assessment = 'High';
SELECT * FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE property_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT policy_number, risk_assessment FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE premium_amount > 2000 ORDER BY policy_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT policy_number, property_value FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE policy_start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT risk_assessment, premium_amount, property_value FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE property_value BETWEEN 200000 AND 300000
SELECT * FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM HomeInsurancePremiums WHERE risk_assessment LIKE '%high%'
SELECT * FROM premiums ORDER BY premium_amount DESC, date_issued ASC;
SELECT id, policy_number, date_issued FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE date_issued BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(risk_score) AS average_risk_score, MAX(risk_score) AS max_risk_score FROM risk_assessment;
SELECT policy_number, assessment_date FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_issued DESC
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE date_issued >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY premium_amount ASC
SELECT policy_number, risk_score FROM premiums p INNER JOIN risk_assessment r ON p.policy_number = r.policy_number WHERE r.assessment_date >= '2022-03-01' AND risk_score > 4 ORDER BY p.policy_number
SELECT policy_number, risk_score FROM premiums p LEFT JOIN risk_assessment r ON p.policy_number = r.policy_number WHERE r.policy_number IS NULL
SELECT AVG(premium_amount) AS avg_premium_amount, MAX(risk_score) AS max_risk_score FROM premiums p INNER JOIN risk_assessment r ON p.policy_number = r.policy_number ORDER BY avg_premium_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_premiums;
SELECT id, policy_number, premium_amount FROM home_insurance_premiums;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM home_insurance_premiums WHERE premium_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history ORDER BY pricing_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, price FROM pricing_history WHERE pricing_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM home_insurance_premiums WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01' AND policy_end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(assessed_risk) AS highest_risk, MIN(assessed_risk) AS lowest_risk FROM risk_assessment;
SELECT policy_number, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM pricing_history GROUP BY policy_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_premiums INNER JOIN risk_assessment ON home_insurance_premiums.policy_number = risk_assessment.policy_number WHERE assessed_risk > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM premiums;
SELECT policyholder_name, email FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT premium_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM policyholders WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM pricing_history;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, phone_number FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY policyholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score >= 80 AND risk_factor IN ('High', 'Medium') ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT premium_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_history GROUP BY premium_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;

SELECT p.id, p.home_address, r.risk_factor, ph.price FROM premiums p JOIN risk_assessment r ON p.id = r.premium_id JOIN pricing_history ph ON p.id = ph.premium_id WHERE r.risk_score >= 70 AND ph.price <= 5000 ORDER BY p.id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, premium_amount FROM home_insurance_premiums
SELECT customer_id, property_address, property_value FROM property_details ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT claim_id, customer_id, claim_amount FROM claim_history WHERE claim_amount > 5000
SELECT customer_id, risk_score, risk_category FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score >= 80 ORDER BY risk_score DESC
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, coverage_amount FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY policy_id
SELECT customer_name, premium_amount FROM home_insurance_premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM property_details ORDER BY property_value DESC
SELECT customer_name, claim_amount FROM home_insurance_premiums JOIN claim_history ON home_insurance_premiums.customer_id = claim_history.customer_id ORDER BY claim_amount ASC
SELECT policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM home_insurance_premiums WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT customer_name, risk_score, risk_category FROM home_insurance_premiums JOIN risk_assessment ON home_insurance_premiums.customer_id = risk_assessment.customer_id WHERE risk_score > 80
